revision.text:
'''Crafts''' in ''[[Escape from Tarkov]]'' allows you to produce many items. It is done through various [[hideout]] modules such as the [[Hideout#Modules|booze generator]], [[Hideout#Modules|lavatory]], [[Hideout#Modules|medstation]], [[Hideout#Modules|nutrition unit]], [[Hideout#Modules|water collector]] and [[Hideout#Modules|workbench]]. Every item crafted in the hideout will have the "found in raid" status. Below is a complete list of these crafts. Item craft time is affected by the [[Crafting]] skill. If you see a craft missing from the list, please join our [https://discord.gg/7ZeEyfU Discord] or note it [[Talk:Crafts|here]]. To search the list use Ctrl+F. ==List of crafts== ===Booze generator=== {| class="wikitable mw-collapsible" style="text-align: center;" sortable" width: auto;" |+ class="nowrap" | !style="width:Auto;"|Needed items !colspan =3 style="width:Auto;"|Module and time !style="width:Auto;"|Produced items |- ![[File:Sugar icon.png|frameless|link=Pack of sugar]] x2
